name: Waifu Bay Resort
description: Welcome to Waifu Bay Resort! This is a special place where most visitors are anime girls. Try on the role of a hotel owner and turn it into a holidaymakers paradise!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
